summary:
The iPhone 6 and 6 Plus are smartphones made by Apple. They were released in 2014 with bigger screens, faster processors, and better cameras. These phones got positive reviews and sold very well. However, some had issues like bending easily ("Bendgate") and touchscreen problems. 

They were replaced by the iPhone 6s models in 2015 and later discontinued. But Apple relaunched the iPhone 6 with more storage in 2017. These phones worked with five versions of iOS.
title: IPhone 6
